message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $90?
I understand your concern, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we discuss a price of $110?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to go down to $100?
I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob. However, I still need to make a profit. How about we meet at $105?
I'm getting close to accepting, but I really want to get as close to $100 as possible. Would you be willing to go down to $102?
I understand your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $104?
I'm really close to accepting, but I still want to get as close to $100 as possible. Would you be willing to go down to $103?
I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob. I'll make one more concession. How about we meet at $106?
I'm not willing to go above $100. I'll make one last offer: $100. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to buy from John.
